WorkItem.Description:
When selecting the ICollection code generation option for a COnfigurationElementCollection, the generated XML documentation is incorrectly generated.  The summary opening tag is missing the closing angle bracket.  This generates a badly formed XML warning. Minor annoyance, except when you like to compile with Treat Errors As Warnings turned on, it is frustrating.
Â 
Using V2.0.0 r4 on Visual Studio 2010 SP1 (v10.0.40219.1)
WorkItem.Summary: ConfigurationElementCollection Code Generation Options broken for ICollections

Comments.Message: I fixed this in source code. Will be part of next release.
